description:
Care for and bond with a whole family of adorable cats! Care for them, play fun games and give them lots of love.

• Look after a whole family of adorable baby kittens: feed them, pat them and watch them grow. • Bond with your cats to discover their unique talents and personalities. • Teach them fun tricks such as running through obstacle courses and walking down the runway.

Please note that elements of this software may have been featured in previously released software.
name: Petz® Cat Superstar
